Or, if you prefer something a bit more grounded in reality, you might enjoy the gritty, thought-provoking "District 9" (2009). Directed by Neill Blomkamp, this movie offers a unique blend of science fiction and social commentary, with Sharlto Copley delivering a standout performance.

If you're looking for something a bit more recent, I'd also recommend "Born on the Fourth of July". It's a biographical drama based on the true story of Ron Kovic, played by Tom Cruise, and it's a powerful exploration of the human cost of war. The film features an all-star cast and is directed by Oliver Stone, so you know you're in for a great watch!
